workshop.title: Self Service BI
workshop.description: Learn how to enable the business to make better decisions faster with the self-service BI cloud services in the Oracle Cloud.

labs.title: Read Me First
labs.description: Overview of the Big Data Self-Service BI User Journey

labs.title: Lab 100: Trial Account Signup
labs.description: Instructions to sign-up for a free trial of Oracle Public Cloud services

labs.title: Lab 100GSE: ALTERNATE VERSION
labs.description: Oracle Employee/Partner instructions to get access to a GSE/demo.oracle.com Oracle Public Cloud demo environment

labs.title: Lab 200: Integration Cloud Service
labs.description: Provision and configure Oracle Integration Cloud Service to collect Twitter data and store in the Oracle Storage Cloud Object Store

labs.title: Lab 300: Big Data Preparation Cloud Service
labs.description: Leverage the Oracle Big Data Preparation Cloud Service to massage your twitter data and store in the Oracle Database Cloud Service

labs.title: Lab 400: Data Visualization Desktop
labs.description: Download, install, and use Oracle Data Visualization Desktop to visualize your twitter data from the Oracle Database Cloud Service

labs.title: Cleanup
labs.description: Instructions to cleanup your cloud service environment.
